transArray.content: The room was clean and tidy. Friendly service at the front desk. Convenient transportation. Opposite the subway station. You can eat oranges when you check in.

The night with stars will not be dark, the sea with sky will be blue, the life with dreams will be full of sunshine, and with your days, our work will be more meaningful. Thank you for choosing to stay at Orange Beijing Wukesong Hotel and giving us such a comprehensive review and approval. The hotel is located diagonally opposite Exit A of Haidian 5th Road Ju Station on Metro Line 6. The transportation is accessible in all directions. Your review is definitely the greatest encouragement for our work. , we will continue our efforts to provide you with a more comfortable and convenient stay experience. All hotel staff look forward to meeting you every time, and wish you success in your work! Manager: Ren Yuanyuan
